content: कूर्मः [कौ जले ऊर्मिर्वेगोऽस्य पृषो° <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A tortoise; गूहेत्कूर्म इवांगानि रक्षेद्विवरमात्मनः <ls>Ms. 7. 105</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 58.</ls> {@--2@} Viṣṇu in his second or Kūrma incarnation. {@--3@} One of the outer winds of the body. {@--4@} A particular gesticulation with the fingers. --र्मी A female tortoise.
